snippet.title: Everhood 2 - Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
AN UNCONVENTIONAL ARPG where you battle enemies through musical encounters while being accompanied by a Raven who promises to retrieve your voice if you slay the mighty Mind Dragon!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1984020/Everhood_2/
Nintendo (America): https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/everhood-2-switch/

Languages: English, Japanese and French.

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/everhood
